com.here.mobility.sdk.map

Class MapData

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.mobility.sdk.map.MapData

  • public class MapData
extends Object
    A named collection of drawable map features. To create one, use MapController.addDataLayer(java.lang.String).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected long addFeature(GeometryOverlay overlay)
      Add a overlay feature to this data collection.

      Add features described in a GeoJSON string to this collection.

      Add a point feature to this collection.

      Add a polygon feature to this collection.
      long addPolyline(PolylineOverlay polyline)
      Add a polyline feature to this collection.
      MapData clear()
      Remove all features from this collection.
      String name()
      Returns the name of this MapData.

      Remove this MapData from the map it is currently associated with.

      Removes the feature with the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • addFeature

        protected long addFeature(GeometryOverlay overlay)
        Add a overlay feature to this data collection.
        Parameters:
        overlay - The feature to add.
        Returns:
        an id with which the feature can be removed.

      • name

        public String name()
        Returns the name of this MapData.
        Returns:
        The name.

      • remove

        public void remove()
        Remove this MapData from the map it is currently associated with. Using this object after remove is called will cause an exception to be thrown. remove is called on every MapData associated with a map when its MapController is destroyed.

      • addPoint

        public long addPoint(@NonNull
                     PointOverlay pointOverlay)
        Add a point feature to this collection.
        Returns:
        an id with which the feature can be removed.

                        PolylineOverlay polyline)
        Add a polyline feature to this collection.
        Parameters:
        polyline - The polyline to add
        Returns:
        an id with which the feature can be removed.

      • addPolygon

        public long addPolygon(@NonNull
                       PolygonOverlay polygon)
        Add a polygon feature to this collection.
        Returns:
        an id with which the feature can be removed.

      • addGeoJson

        public void addGeoJson(String data)
        Add features described in a GeoJSON string to this collection.
        Parameters:
        data - A string containing a GeoJSON FeatureCollection

      • removeFeature

        public boolean removeFeature(long id)
        Removes the feature with the given id.
        Returns:
        whether a feature with the given id actually existed (and was removed).

      • clear

        public MapData clear()
        Remove all features from this collection.
        Returns:
        This object, for chaining.
